title: WATCH: Gary Neville Reacting To His Old Tweets Is Absolute Gold
text:
WATCH: Gary Neville Reacting To His Old Tweets Is Absolute Gold Wed Feb 22 2017 01:14:41 GMT+0000 (GMT) Wed Feb 22 2017 01:14:41 GMT+0000 (GMT) Jack Kenmare Jack Kenmare in football 
Gary Neville is a wonderful human being. Even his biggest critics will admit that his punditry with Sky Sports in recent years has been nothing short of world class. Yes, even the Liverpool fans out there. 
The former Manchester United defender is also a dab hand on the old Twitter, and Soccer Am's finest Tubes has featured in a brilliant video with Neville. 
Neville scrolled through his Twitter feed to read some of his most famous tweets. From calling out pictures of Liverpool fans taking photos of Mourinho to constantly slating his best mate Jamie Carragher, this really is a quality piece of content from the Soccer Am boys. 
Here's the footage. Classic stuff from Neville, fair play: 
Back in December, An alleged prank call on former Manchester United player Gary Neville was doing the rounds. The call, which appeared to be old and originally popped up on YouTube, resurfaced and the video went viral. 
The prank call comprises of a lad called John on the phone to Neville, who says he will let him off if he tells him who has got his number because this is the first time his number came up. 
John's response is that he got it off someone from Millfield school - a bit of googling shows that a co-educational independent school with the same name is based in Street, Somerset, England. John says that his school is in Bristol. 
Brilliant: 
Keep up the good work. Sponsored Links
